name: @ficusjs/renderers
description: Minified ES module renderers for FicusJS

scripts.build:create-element: rollup -i src/create-element.js -o dist/create-element.js -f es -p "node-resolve={}" -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}"
scripts.build:htm: rollup -i src/htm.js -o dist/htm.js -f es -p "alias={entries:{'./constants.mjs':'./constants-mini.mjs'}}" -p "commonjs={}" -p "node-resolve={}" -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}"
scripts.build:htm-preact: rollup -i src/htm-preact.js -o dist/htm-preact.js -f es -p "node-resolve={}" -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}"
scripts.build:uhtml: rollup -i src/uhtml.js -o dist/uhtml.js -f es -p "node-resolve={}" -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}"
scripts.build:lit-html: rollup -i src/lit-html.js -o dist/lit-html.js -f es -p "node-resolve={}" -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}"

author: Matt Levy
